name: blow
description: blow LTD has over 1200 beauty professionals, who provide blow dry, makeup, nails, waxing, massage, lashes, facials, spray tans and more for busy, time-poor women across London, Manchester and Birmingham.

jobs.title: CRM Manager
jobs.description:
blow LTD are looking for a hands-on CRM manager. The right candidate for this role would be someone who is great at writing, communication and is a self-starter. There is plenty of opportunity for learning and growth, however, there are two core functions of this role:

First, this role requires the creation of email content, including copy and imagery. This is 70% of the role.

Second, to manage all CRM automation programs, including acquisition conversion, retention and lapsed user re-engagement. 

There is also an opportunity to get involved in designing and executing a loyalty program, long-term initiatives, customer personas and segmentation. 

Candidates must have a proven track record and a minimum of 3 years of relevant experience. Beauty or fashion industry experience is preferred but not required.
